entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @morningmika Sorry media,  you lost the right to ride the COVID-19 train when it became inconvenient to do so during the protests.  100% behind BLM, but y'all should've been screaming "protest safely" at the top of your collective lungs.  Can't pin further spread on WH.
